entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
